content:
Originally the Gentlemen’s Library at The Pierre, the bar was redesigned by Alexandra Champalimaud to reflect an effortlessly chic Upper East Side residence.

Celebrate the season with Two E! On Friday, November 23rd, indulge in our Black Friday Afternoon Tea and the chance to win a $100 gift card to Barney's!  Thursday, November 29th, join us for our annual tree lighting party.

Two E is proud to feature live music from the brightest stars of Broadway and Jazz.

Experience our new Tiffin & Tea service! Inspired by the vibrancy of this beloved tradition, we offer a selection of small bites with Indian & Taj flair!

Explore Two E's elegant interior with a 360-degree virtual tour.

View Menu Tiffin & Tea Menu
Make a Reservation
